distribution_pattern: Primary direct account distribution is within California. Firm is currently working on distribution list information.
product_description: Teriyaki Sauce, Red Shell branded.  Ingredients: Soy sauce(water, soybeans, wheat, salt, sodium benzoate), water, sugar, cooking wine( water, rice, malt), sweet cooking wine(corn syrup, rice, water, malt), modified food starch, dried onion, dried ginger root, dried garlic, lactic acid, spices. "Shake well before use. Keep Refrigerated after opening" UPC# 0-18529-10001-9 (12 ounce) UPC# 0-18529-10505-6 (1 gallon)
product_quantity: 48 bottles (1 gallon size), 933 bottles (12 ounce size)
reason_for_recall: Shelf stable Teriyaki sauce showing signs of micro growth (bubbling) and swelling containers.
code_info: Lot: 120326  This is also the best by date printed on the container.

initial_firm_notification: Letter
distribution_pattern: Distribution centers and retail locations across the U.S.
product_description: Rocky Road Ice Cream packaged in a Breyer Chocolate Truffle Tub that says "may contain tree nuts" with a Breyers Rocky Road Ice Cream Lid that declares almonds as an ingredient. 1.5 qt
product_quantity: 6668 cases (roughly 12 individual units believed to be affected)
reason_for_recall: Undeclared allergens and mislabeled product.  Rocky Road Ice was packaged with Chocolate Truffle Ice Cream labeled tub and a Rocky Road Ice Cream lid. Tub said "may contain tree nuts" the lid said it did contain almonds.
